description: After Mark Allison told us all about the ActionBar he's writing a new series all about styling it - be sure that you check it out.

description: Daniel Box recently completed the intense task of creating an Android testing MindMap. As you can see, there’s a lot to take into account when testing an Android app or website.

description: Android ADT Templates is a small collection of ADT templates for Android development to help quickly scaffold common Activity and UI patterns compiled by Jeff Gilfelt.

description: In the following two blog entries Cyril Mottier shares some desiger resources. In the first post he explains how to create appealing screenshots for your app.

description: A collection of screenshots encompassing some of the best, most beautiful looking Android apps.

description: Analysis  of user growth, growing counties, daily downloads, active install etc. etc. is extremely important to track the performance of app on appstore. This post shows you how to do it the best way.
title: Android Appstore Download Analysis tools
